  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: namespace Larabros\Elogram\Container;
  4: 
  5: use Larabros\Elogram\Config;
  6: use Larabros\Elogram\Providers\CoreServiceProvider;
  7: use Larabros\Elogram\Providers\EntityServiceProvider;
  8: use Larabros\Elogram\Providers\GuzzleServiceProvider;
  9: use Larabros\Elogram\Providers\MiddlewareServiceProvider;
 10: use League\Container\Container;
 11: use League\Container\ContainerAwareInterface;
 12: use League\Container\ContainerAwareTrait;
 13: use League\Container\ContainerInterface;
 14: use League\Container\ServiceProvider\ServiceProviderInterface;
 15: 
 16: /**
 17:  * Builds `Container` objects for use by the application.
 18:  *
 19:  * @package    Elogram
 20:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
 21:  * @link       https://github.com/larabros/elogram
 22:  * @license    MIT
 23:  */
 24: class Builder implements ContainerAwareInterface
 25: {
 26:     use ContainerAwareTrait;
 27: 
 28:     /**
 29:      * Default application service providers.
 30:      *
 31:      * @var array
 32:      */
 33:     protected $defaultProviders = [
 34:         CoreServiceProvider::class,
 35:         MiddlewareServiceProvider::class,
 36:         GuzzleServiceProvider::class,
 37:         EntityServiceProvider::class,
 38:     ];
 39: 
 40:     /**
 41:      * Creates a new instance of `Builder`. If `$registerProviders` is set to
 42:      * `true`, then the default providers are registered onto the container.
 43:      *
 44:      * @param array $config
 45:      * @param bool  $registerProviders
 46:      */
 47:     public function __construct(array $config, $registerProviders = true)
 48:     {
 49:         $this->setContainer($this->createContainer($config));
 50:         $this->createConfig($this->getContainer()->get('config.raw'));
 51: 
 52:         if ($registerProviders) {
 53:             $this->registerProviders($this->defaultProviders);
 54:         }
 55:     }
 56: 
 57:     /**
 58:      * Creates a `Config` object from raw parameters.
 59:      *
 60:      * @param array $config
 61:      *
 62:      * @return Config
 63:      */
 64:     protected function createConfig(array $config)
 65:     {
 66:         $this->getContainer()->share('config', new Config($config));
 67:     }
 68: 
 69:     /**
 70:      * Register default service providers onto the container.
 71:      *
 72:      * @param array $providers
 73:      *
 74:      * @return Builder
 75:      */
 76:     public function registerProviders(array $providers = [])
 77:     {
 78:         foreach ($providers as $provider) {
 79:             $this->registerProvider($provider);
 80:         }
 81:         return $this;
 82:     }
 83: 
 84:     /**
 85:      * Registers a service provider onto the container.
 86:      *
 87:      * @param string|ServiceProviderInterface $provider
 88:      *
 89:      * @return Builder
 90:      */
 91:     public function registerProvider($provider)
 92:     {
 93:         $this->getContainer()->addServiceProvider($provider);
 94:         return $this;
 95:     }
 96: 
 97:     /**
 98:      * Creates and returns a new instance of `Container` after adding `$config`
 99:      * to it.
100:      *
101:      * @param array $config
102:      *
103:      * @return ContainerInterface
104:      */
105:     public function createContainer(array $config)
106:     {
107:         $container = new Container();
108:         $container->add('config.raw', $config);
109:         $this->setContainer($container);
110:         return $this->getContainer();
111:     }
112: }
113:
